name: Airport Dash
description:
Airport Dash is a top down, arcade-style game that puts you in the cockpit of commercial airplanes, navigating them safely between major hubs across the United States.

Avoid clouds, hurricanes, and other weather systems - they'll wreck your plane - as you rush your plane to its destination as quickly as possible. The faster you get there, the higher your score!

Don't panic if you start losing lives - grab extra lives as they appear around the map!

✈

Controls:

W/↑: Accelerate
A/←: Turn counter-clockwise
S/↓: Brake
D/→: Turn clockwise

HTML5 users: If the game doesn't fit in your browser window, use ⌘-, ctrl -, or the zoom controls in the View menu to zoom out.
